MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the DG8 postcode area of Kirkcowan. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers have now arrived on site and have established a grounded overhead power line. For safety reasons, we needed to carry out an emergency shutdown at 2:55pm and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:00pm on Thursday 11th March 2021
